Originally played this game on console about ten years ago (when it came as part of The Orange Box), and it still holds up! If you like puzzle games, dry humor, and dark dystopian lore, why haven't you played Portal yet?

Great Game!
it is very fun and I got it done in like,  6 hours. What a day! But still buy the bundle with Portal and Portal 2 because there wasn't much content in this one. Recommend it and hope you'll buy it.
An absolute must have for anyone who loves puzzles

Portal es un juego que se te puede pasar rápido si lo disfrutas mucho (como en mi caso), sin embargo, tiene logros que algunos se consiguen jugando a las pruebas avanzadas y en los desafíos.
 Una historia divertida con un antagonista perverso pero con unos chistes.
Timeless game for casual puzzlers. Changed the genre for the better! Great premise that leaves you wanting more (that you'll find in Portal 2)!

Portal - Это классная головоломка которую легко пройти за 1 ч. или 1.30 мин я например прошел за час + час еще выполнял достижения которые мне не зашитали почему то :( 
Так к чему я клоню, эта игра увлекает своим геймплеем и немного сюжетом :)
Цель игры - збежать с подземного центра для испытания порталов и т.д

Honestly, it's perfect in all other areas except of the length. Mind-bending and challengeing gameplay with hilarious, yet sinister voice acting. Don't get me even started on the ending. It's amazing and you should play it. Try to buy it from a sale because it's so short.

Short but sweet. This game is fun to play, fun to listen to the dialogue and the puzzles make you feel fulfilled after you solve them. I was very surprised at the actual time it took for me to beat the game though.

2已通关的我玩第19关差点吐了，g胖真有你的啊

考试前一周花八个小时两天通了关
第一天打到17关结束，最后两关第二天用了整整四个小时，当然期间包括很长时间暂停下来去做别的事了。
就像所有人说的，创意，新奇，细腻。需要你认真去思考，不断的重力加速会让本体的初速度越来越快，第19关从下水道出来的那里，整整跳了半个小时，令人心疼的熟练度和反应速度，但是在滞空的刺激感让人不断在心里感叹这个游戏设计之巧妙，3D眩晕的朋友可以不用考虑了，这个游戏应该可以成为检测自己抗眩晕能力的最好例证了，我自己没有任何不适，考完试打算再通关一遍。
I like the game, but I keep trying to load test chamber 08 but it just stays at the menu screen, am I doing something wrong or do I wait?
Puzzles muito divertidos, jogabilidade muito f0da. Vale a pena jogar.

re piola el portal

Je ne suis pas quelqu'un de très patient ou qui aime réfléchir, et j'ai assez de mal avec le côté FPS. Et malgré tout ça, j'ai passé un très bon moment sur portal juste parce que l'ambiance est trop bien et qu'on se laisse prendre au jeu malgré le minimalisme assumé : ACHETEZ LE !
It's a pretty good game, but I ddnt feel as amazed as some ppl are. Still, game worth its price.
Literaly the best game I've ever played. Would recommend you buy.
